Name: [Deployed] Plugboo
Desc: Active Skill: Unleashes an EM cannon attack on the enemy, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> and accumulating <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color>.
Desc2: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack: Unleash a strong electric attack on all nearby enemies in a large area, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> and inflicting massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color>.</color>
